<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 345 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodlines**
[Hag](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=8), [Genie](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=11)

**Deities**
[Hastur](/Deities.aspx?ID=162), [Likha](/Deities.aspx?ID=192), [Likha](/Deities.aspx?ID=192), [Mahathallah](/Deities.aspx?ID=170), [Mahathallah](/Deities.aspx?ID=170), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=44), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), [Sivanah](/Deities.aspx?ID=46), [The Lantern King](/Deities.aspx?ID=95)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

 Casting _illusory disguise_ counts as setting up a disguise for the [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) use of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) and [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246) traits.

**Heightened (3rd)** You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.
name: Illusory Disguise
